name: whine
actor_no_arg: You whine to anyone who will listen to you.
others_no_arg: $n whines pathetically to anyone who will listen.
actor_found_target: You whine to $M, hoping desperately that at least $E will give a damn.
target_found: $n whines pathetically to you.  What a loser!
others_auto: $n whines to $mself.  At least $e isn't bitching to YOU.
